subject: Re: [junit] Cactus
msgSnippet: ...  Your server is not running. Why it isn t running is not something we can diagnose from here without more information. There is a Cactus mailing
messageBody:
Siamack wrote:

> Hello Everyone:
> I am trying to run my Cactus test from within the Websphere Studio
> Application Server and I get the following errors. Can anyone give me a
> hint on what can be wrong here. I would appreciate all your replies in
> advance.

> java.net.ConnectException: Connection refused: connect
<snip />

Your server is not running. Why it isn't running is not something we can
diagnose from here without more information.

There is a Cactus mailing list. Google "Cactus mailing list" and you'll
find it. Ask there.
--
